resources.string: You have already got this extension
Customize each Rover with a different color of their own. Make your experience extra colorful!
Add as many Rovers as you want, with no limitations, and make your Rovers experience wider than ever!
Get the Rover trigger settings, and make your Rovers experience unique!
This includes it all, as in all current extensions and the future ones that will come.
Sorry, this option is available only with the "More Colors" extension.
You\'ve reached the maximum amount of Rovers. Add more by getting "More Rovers" Extension or remove existing.
Sorry, this option is available only with the "More Settings" extension.
Get more features which will make the Rovers experience even better!
You got all of the available extensions
We will continue doing everything we can to make Rovers even better for you
